dcterms:description: Whole-body patient studies using a Siemens Biograph mCT scanner, focusing on the effects of malfunctioning block detectors on PET imaging.
dcterms:title: Whole-body patient studies (Siemens Biograph mCT scanner)

dcterms:description: Sinogram data from 20 PET/CT patient scans, used for training and testing the Sinogram Repair Network.
dcterms:title: Sinogram data from 20 PET/CT patient scans

dcterms:description: Sinogram masks generated for simulating defective block detectors during training of the neural network.
dcterms:title: Sinogram masks for simulating defective block detectors

dcterms:description: Ground truth sinograms used for comparison in evaluating the performance of the Sinogram Repair Network.
dcterms:title: Ground truth sinograms for comparison

dcterms:description: Test set consisting of 7,164 sinograms used to evaluate the performance of the Sinogram Repair Network.
dcterms:title: Test set of 7,164 sinograms
